title: Macworld Podcast: Introducing the iPhone 15, Apple Watch Series 9 and Ultra 2
content:
Macworld

Apple held its Wonderlust event and the new iPhone 15 and Apple Warches are here! On this episode of the Macworld Podcast, we talk about the event, the new products, and more!

This is episode 855 with Jason Cross, Michael Simon, and Roman Loyola. 

Listen to episode 855 on Apple Podcasts

Listen to episode 855 on Spotify

Get info 

If you want more info on the products announced at Wonderlust, visit “Catch up on everything announced” at the event.

Subscribe to the Macworld Podcast

You can subscribe to the Macworld Podcast—or leave us a review!—right here in the Podcasts app. The Macworld Podcast is also available on Spotify. Or you can point your favorite podcast-savvy RSS reader at: https://feeds.megaphone.fm/macworld

To find previous episodes, visit Macworld’s podcast page or our home on MegaPhone.

Apple Watch, iPhone
